title: Payout Initiated
description: Fired when a payout is initiated.

amount.description: The monetary amount of the payout.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).

destination.description: The destination account or identifier for the payout.

method.description: The method used for the payout (e.g. bank_transfer, check).
